SEARCH
Modul wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung
Package wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.models.userProfile

Klasse Badge

java.lang.Object
wbh.wbh_projekt_privatebuchhaltung.models.userProfile.Badge
public class Badge extends Object
Represents a badge that can be earned by reaching a target number of goals. Each badge tracks its name, completion status, and completion date.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Badge

      public Badge(int id, String name, int targetReachedGoals, boolean completed, Date completedDate)
      Constructs a new Badge with all attributes.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique identifier of the badge
      name - the name of the badge
      targetReachedGoals - the number of goals required to earn this badge
      completed - whether the badge has been completed
      completedDate - the date when the badge was completed

    • Badge

      public Badge(String name, int targetReachedGoals, boolean completed, Date completedDate)
      Constructs a new Badge without an ID.
      Parameter:
      name - the name of the badge
      targetReachedGoals - the number of goals required to earn this badge
      completed - whether the badge has been completed
      completedDate - the date when the badge was completed
